meanings.sent1: His misdoings caused trouble for everyone around him.
meanings.sent2: The teacher had to address the student's misdoings in class.
meanings.sent3: The misdoings of the mischievous puppy made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her misdoings were like a dark cloud hanging over her reputation.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of his misdoings were severe and long-lasting.

meanings.sent1: The company's misdoings were exposed by a whistleblower.
meanings.sent2: The investigation revealed a pattern of misdoings within the organization.
meanings.sent3: The misdoings of the clumsy magician kept the audience on their toes.
meanings.sent4: Her misdoings were a stain on the otherwise clean record of the team.
meanings.sent5: The impact of their misdoings reverberated throughout the community.
